tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE car_parts_inventory (
    part_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    part_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity_available INT NOT NULL,
    manufacturing_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE manufacturing_process (
    process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_id INT REFERENCES car_parts(part_id),
    stage_name VARCHAR(50),
    stage_description TEXT,
    is_completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE part_availability (
   availability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   part_id INT,
   process_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES car_parts(part_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES manufacturing_process(process_id)
);

CREATE TABLE part_usage (
  usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  part_id INT,
  process_id INT,
  usage_quantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES car_parts(part_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES manufacturing_process(process_id)
);

CREATE TABLE part_availability (
  availability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  part_id INT,
  available_quantity INT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES car_parts(part_id)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_id INT NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    available_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES car_parts(part_id)
);

CREATE TABLE process_steps (
    step_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    process_id INT NOT NULL,
    step_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    step_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES manufacturing_process(process_id)
);

CREATE TABLE assembly (
    assembly_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_id INT NOT NULL,
    process_id INT NOT NULL,
    step_id INT NOT NULL,
    assembly_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES car_parts(part_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES manufacturing_process(process_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (step_id) REFERENCES process_steps(step_id)
);
